name: FreeFire Jigsaw Puzzle
description:
Freefire Jigsaw Puzzle game

Fun to play with lots of HD puzzles.

Features of the game
  • HD picture puzzle
  • Locked puzzles can only be unlocked after completing a puzzle
  • Count down timer
  • Calm soothing music while solving puzzles
  • Get a little help with some Hints
  • Transparent background as reference
  • Correct puzzle pieces sticks to board
To play on mobile devices
  • Enable Desktop site
  • Tap Run Puzzle Game
  • After the game opens
  • Zoom in and click on enable fullscreen at the bottom of the game frame
  • Then Rotate phone to Landscape mode
  • And enjoy the game
